title: Magic Born
description: When opposites meet, chemistry sparks. Or is it Magic?If you meet a hot guy at school, you usually don't have a near death experience with him shortly there after. Or gain crazy powers, and see evil dust creatures that are trying to kill you. And the hot guy. Who is the only one who sees them too. But all these things happen to Becca and Max in Magic Born.For them, it is only the beginning...
author: C.J. Kayne
